# packter protocol format

= Abstract =

This article specified a protocol format between Packter Viewer and Packter Agent. Remark that Packter Viewer is a multi-purpose traffic visualizer and Packter Agent is a commander for Packter Viewer. 

= Details =
== PACKTER ==
This command is used for drawing flying objects.The format is as follows.
{{{
PACKTER
SRCIP,DSTIP,SRCPORT,DSTPORT,FLAG,BUFF
}}}

== PACKTERMSG ==
PACKTERMSG is used for showing message
